PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: tiered authentication of multicast protocol for densedad-hoc network (TAM)
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
its protocol application for ad-hoc network, where the network will have multiple clusters and each clusters will have there nodes and the inter cluster and intra cluster communication can done in without any authentication but in our project we tried to overcome this problem 
by providing authentication for all nodes and and even though there is a node which is not authenticated without log in to the server he is disabled the felicity of communication with other nodes of network and one more problem in ad-hoc   network is loss of the data in the transmission medium leads to user data misuse 
we used private key encryption and decryption techniques 
and if we find the data is lost in the network the whole data willl be re-transmitted.
as title of project defines tired authentication 
this application creates a tires between the node so that we achive authentication and data security.
